description: Information about a single microscope channel.
title: Channel
name: channel

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

channel_id.description: User given ID.  If there is an accompanying codebook, this name should correspond to the channel id used in the codebook.

excitation_wavelength.description: Excitation wavelength of the lightsource in nanometers.

multiplexed.description: Whether multiple targets were detected simultaneously in this channel.
multiplexed.example: Should be one of: yes, or no.

target_fluorophore.description: The name of the fluorophore this channel is designed to assay.

exposure_time.description: Acquisition time for a single image per channel, in milliseconds.
